item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Charlotte Brontë
item.description: "Do you think I am an automaton? — a machine without feelings? and can bear to have my morsel of bread snatched from my lips, and my drop of living water dashed from my cup? Do you think, because I am poor, obscure, plain, and little, I am soulless and heartless? You think wrong! — I have as much soul as you — and full as much heart! And if God had gifted me with some beauty and much wealth, I should have made it as hard for you to leave me, as it is now for me to leave you. I am not talking to you now through the medium of custom, conventionalities, nor even of mortal flesh: it is my spirit that addresses your spirit; just as if both had passed through the grave, and we stood at God's feet, equal — as we are!" -- Charlotte Brontë

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Jennifer Egan
item.description: "I'm always happy," Sasha said. "Sometimes I just forget." -- Jennifer Egan

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Barbara Kingsolver
item.description: "The very least you can do in your life is figure out what you hope for. And the most you can do is live inside that hope. Not admire it from a distance but live right in it, under its roof." -- Barbara Kingsolver

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "Some people never go crazy. What truly horrible lives they must lead." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Alfred Lord Tennyson
item.description: "Hope Smiles from the threshold of the year to come, Whispering 'it will be happier'..." -- Alfred Lord Tennyson

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Robert Fulghum
item.description: "We’re all a little weird. And life is a little weird. And when we find someone whose weirdness is compatible with ours, we join up with them and fall into mutually satisfying weirdness—and call it love—true love." -- Robert Fulghum

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Sue Monk Kidd
item.description: "All my life I've thought I needed someone to complete me, now I know I need to belong to myself." -- Sue Monk Kidd

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Logan Pearsall Smith
item.description: "People say that life is the thing, but I prefer reading." -- Logan Pearsall Smith

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Books are a uniquely portable magic." -- Stephen King

item.title: Tiffany add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description: "You never really understand a person until you consider things from his point of view... Until you climb inside of his skin and walk around in it." -- Harper Lee
